metadata.name: Practice ANY Boss with ANY Character
metadata.description:
This mod allows you to practice any boss with any character and with any randomized amounts of items that you want. Character/Item/Boss configuration is done through the mod config menu, and the practice run can be started as a custom challenge where achievements are disabled.
Mod Compatibility (WIP): - Modded characters will get added to the option list when a run is started with them, and they will be removed from the list if you ever "reset to defaults" - Modded characters will remain on the option list after you remove their mod, but the option will no longer work (even if you re-enable the mod), so you should "reset to defaults" to remove broken options.
Known Issues: - Modded Characters will overwrite Tainted Jacob/Esau's option. - Delirium won't be able to transform into another boss since you haven't encountered any other bosses during the run.
